room_title: Escape room "Red Carpet" by MindBreak in St. Louis
room_description:
It’s the End of the roaring 20’s, Flapper dresses, furs and, elaborate jewelry adorned women of wealth, dancing the Charleston, Cakewalk, and Fleahop as jazz fills the airwaves. The Big Screen towered with greats such as Phantom of the Opera, Ben Hur, Dr. Jeckle and Mr. Hyde, Alfred Hitchcock , and Mickey Mouse.

The underground bootleggers, and gangsters such as Al Capone ruled as the looming Great Depression was about to put an end to the wanton, lavish, life style so many enjoyed. A Starlet’s heart has been broken by one of her directors. The glamorous “First Ever” ACADEMY AWARDS are TONIGHT. The jilted Movie STAR knows that “HER DIRECTOR’ is up for an award, and she has stolen the prized trophies. Enter her scorned world and her dressing room to search. You must find them, you have 1 hour, THE SHOW MUST GO ON!
